detail_desc: Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a motif and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with a lace-covered V-neck at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in pleated, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a decorative flower at the top. Jersey lining.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
SUPREME STRETCH. 5-pocket slim-fit jeans in soft, stretch denim for optimal comfort with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and zip fly and button.
Long-sleeved top in thin, printed cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and give a fuller cleavage. Lace racer back and narrow hook-and-eye fastenings at the back. Lined crotch with concealed press-studs.

Soft, padded bra in lace with removable inserts and moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elastic hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Whooli Chen x H&M. Jumpsuit in soft, Tencel™ lyocell twill with buttons at the front and covered elastication with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and covered elastication at the cuffs, and straight legs.
Fitted, V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves.

Waterproof trainers in mesh with imitation leather sections, a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front, a grosgrain loop at the back, and reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low  dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Long-sleeved dress in textured jersey made from a cotton blend. Round neckline with a press-stud at one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button,side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a rounded, ribbed hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Sleeveless playsuit in airy, patterned viscose with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam and twisted ties with tassels at the waist.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length shirt dress in soft viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Elasticated seam and a detachable belt under the bust, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
Two-strand hairband with braids in imitation suede and elastic at the back.
Wide pull-on trousers in soft viscose jersey with straight legs and a gentle flare to the hem. Wide smocking at the waist for a comfortable fit.
Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Leggings in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Umbrella in transparent, printed plastic with a plastic handle. Length 77 cm.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.

Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and yoke with a frill trim that continues over the shoulders. Side pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from cotton and silk.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Suede court shoes with covered heels. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Ballet pumps with a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a detachable, pile-lined hood with imitation-leather details. Stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a wind flap and press-studs. Chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Long earrings in metal with faceted sparkly stones at the top and long fabric tassels at the bottom. Length 18 cm.
Short shorts in sturdy cotton jersey with a high, paper bag waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Velour hooded top with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Bow tie/tie with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Soft running gloves with a moisture-absorbing terry section on the thumbs and cuffs at the top. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material. Unlined.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, long sleeves and smocking at the cuffs and hem.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved, knee-length dress in stretch jersey crêpe with a wrapover V-neck, seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a button placket. One in pointelle.
V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and super-skinny shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a motif on the front, cut-out sections on the shoulders and short raglan sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.

Sleeveless, fitted sports top in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric. Zip at the top, wide elastication at the hem and a racer back. The top is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with side pockets, fake welt back pockets and gently tapered legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for the best fit over the tummy.
Metal earrings in the shape of a face. Length 5 cm.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the back, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved base layer top in soft, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in sturdy cotton denim. Regular waist with covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, and wide, tapered legs.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.

Wide blouse in a soft, woven cotton blend with embroidery. Gathered V-neck and ties at the top with tasselled ends, long raglan, puff sleeves with gathers, narrow buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and frills at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and frilled hems.
Sleeveless, all-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and appliqués on the chest. Shoulder straps with press-studs on one shoulder, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a ribbed trim around the neckline. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length, pleated skirt in a patterned chiffon weave with an elasticated waist and slits at the front. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal hair clips with glittery felt appliqués. Length 3.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.

Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs. The trunks are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Sleeveless, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a square neck front and back, seam at the waist and calf-length skirt with a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and slightly longer legs with raw-edge hems.

Straight-cut dress in an airy, textured weave with a small frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a flounce at the front that runs down the sleeves to the cuffs. Partly lined.

Sleeveless dress in lightweight cotton canvas with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that join at the back. Buttons down the front, narrow elastication at the top of the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
